content: Chef Allan’s satire, so finely basted, before being plattered Spicer says this spat’s not real, to the press corp he chattered Doesn’t seem to know his credibility is already shattered Tries to explain why Bannon ’s face looks bruised and battered Says Kushner’s choice not nepotism like it really mattered And yes, Ivanka wearing Ivanka Trump fashions will never look tattered While Daddy wanders the White House halls looking to be flattered
